alert.note: Alert for Evans; Tattnall (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Charleston (the Southern end of South Carolina and Eastern Georgia)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 24 at 8:39PM EDT until July 24 at 11:30PM EDT by NWS Charleston
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1030 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Georgia, including the following counties, Candler, Evans and Tattnall. * WHEN...Until 1030 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 839 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1.5 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Metter, Collins, Cobbtown, Aline and Metter Municiple Airport.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
